ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Mar 2000, Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> 1) When fighting ice goblin casters and the ice giant diplomat
> I lost my mystic shielding or elemental icon immediately
> during any spell attack. This probably applies to all spells
> from all NPCs, just stated what I fought for reference.
>
> an ice goblin evoker casts a spell.
> You feel an aura of _____ protection.
> Your aura fades.
> You convulse as lightning surges through your body.
> You feel an aura of _____ protection.
> You feel an aura of _____ protection.
> an ice goblin evoker casts a spell.
> Your aura fades.
> Your skin ignites.
>
> It's really ridiculous, any spell that hits me cancels the
> resist shield from the song. It's like not playing any
> protection song at all, because everything hits for full
> since the shield drops due to the attack.

Sounds like a bug. It should only be happening with Niv's, as
that's the only song that's supposed to have a spell damage
shield (once the shield absorbs the damage, the shield/song
drops). If it's happening with other resist songs, I'd /bug
it.

> 2) Charm has lost it's mem blur component. This was clearly
> evident when I charmed 3 ice goblins after beating them
> down to almost no health to let a lower level player gain
> exp from them. I got the kill all three times.

I was doing this to help some friends a couple days ago. I
had no problems with it. There are some cases (usually when a
DoT is in effect) where charm will not wipe the damage
history. There's speculation too that it's only effective
about 90% of the time at wiping the damage list.

--
